forward_snippets: (2) We believe the non-GAAP financial measure of constant currency revenue is useful in analyzing the underlying trends in average monthly revenue per paying membership (ARM) absent foreign currency fluctuations.
We expect that from time to time the prices of our membership plans in each country may change and we may test other plan and price variations.
